  output_folder <- here::here("HTML");

  rmarkdown::render(input, params = "ask"); 
  source(move_script); 
  move_output(input, output_folder, figure_folder) })

    df_print: paged
    highlight: tango
    self_contained: true
    fig_width: 7
    fig_height: 4
    code_folding: hide
editor_options:
  markdown:
    wrap: 80
  chunk_output_type: inline

# Set-up

## Set options & import sources

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.width = 7,
  fig.height = 4,
  out.width = "100%",
  out.height = "100%",
  dpi = 500,
  dev = "ragg_png"
)

options(contrasts = c("contr.sum", "contr.poly"))
